channel.description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~$~$~$~LUNASCAPE~$~$~$~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Stable economy
All specials work
Curses 100%
All bosses work
All minigames work
Nex armour
Dragon defender
Dragon claws
Duel arena works 100%
NO DUPES (if you try duping then you wont be abel to login anymore)
All chaotics
Good skilling areas
Fast training
Dicing system
Dungeoneering
Good train areas
Abyssal vine whip
Vesta
Statius
Overloads work 100%!
Korasi (spec works 100%!)
And a lot of more just check it out by yourself
